name: Number Blocks - Logic Puzzle
description:
Exercise your logic with an addictive grid puzzle – Number Blocks! The rules are extremely simple, just fill the board with rectangular and square blocks. Each block contains one number that shows its size. Can you solve it?

What you get:

• Easy to play logic puzzle
• Hundreds of levels to explore from easy to hard
• Hints to help you reach the goal faster
• No time limit, so relax and enjoy hours of fun
• New game from a top developer!

Challenge your brain with Number Blocks anywhere, anytime!
